name: googleapis-bootstrapper
description: Bootstraps the initial files on new APIs to generate libraries
author: Google LLC.

scripts.test: cd cli && npm i && npm t cd ../common-container && npm i && npm t
scripts.fix: cd cli && npm i && npm run fix && cd ../common-container && npm i && npm run fix
scripts.lint: cd cli && npm i && npm run lint && cd ../common-container && npm i && npm run lint
